estimates.question: How many flights take off globally per day?
estimates.justification: ~4 billion passengers/year ÷ 365 days ÷ ~100 passengers/flight ≈ 110,000 flights/day. Actual: ~100,000.

estimates.question: How much does the atmosphere weigh?
estimates.justification: Atmospheric pressure ~101,325 Pa. Earth surface ≈ 5.1 × 10^14 m². Weight = P × A ≈ 5.17 × 10^19 N → mass ≈ 5.15 × 10^18 kg.
